short_description_localized.en: Featuring two four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful Manhattan views, our 1150 square foot City View  Two Bedroom Suites offer quintessential Manhattan charm
short_description_localized.es: Featuring two four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful Manhattan views, our 1150 square foot City View  Two Bedroom Suites offer quintessential Manhattan charm

description_localized.en: Featuring two four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful Manhattan views, our 1150 square foot City View  Two Bedroom Suites offer quintessential Manhattan charm and are situated on floors 5 to 14. These suites feature two separate bedrooms with 1 King and 2 Twin beds, two Bathrooms, and a separate living area with high ceilings and large windows.
description_localized.es: Featuring two four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful Manhattan views, our 1150 square foot City View  Two Bedroom Suites offer quintessential Manhattan charm and are situated on floors 5 to 14. These suites feature two separate bedrooms with 1 King and 2 Twin beds, two Bathrooms, and a separate living area with high ceilings and large windows.

images.name: City-View-Two-Bedroom-Suites-Master-Bedroom
images.caption: Master Bedroom
images.alt:
The City View Two Bedroom Suite offer spectacular views of Manhattan’s Upper East Side. The small foyer opens to an elegantly designed living room that features a comfortable sofa and coffee table opposite the 40” wall mounted TV and console with mini bar.  There are 2 side chairs and side table along at the far side of the living room. An executive writing desk and chair completes the room.
 
The suites comprise of two bedrooms – the master bedroom features a plush and comfortable king bed, chaise, two night stands with Bose Wave Studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock. A 40” TV and console is located across from the bed. The Turkish marble-clad bathroom features glass-enclosed shower, soaking tub, plush bathrobes and towels and Etro bath amenities.

The second bedroom comprises of twin beds, the room features a nightstand between the two beds, Bose Wave studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock and an executive writing desk and chair. A 40” wall mounted TV and console with mini bar is located across the bed. The Turkish marble-clad bathroom features glass-enclosed shower, soaking tub, plush bathrobes and towels and Etro bath amenities.

images.caption: Living Room
images.alt: The small foyer opens to an elegantly designed living room that features a comfortable sofa and coffee table opposite the 40” wall mounted TV and console with mini bar.  There are 2 side chairs and side table along at the far side of the living room. An executive writing desk and chair completes the room.

images.caption: Second Bedroom
images.alt: The second bedroom comprises of twin beds, the room features a nightstand between the two beds, Bose Wave studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock and an executive writing desk and chair. A 40” wall mounted TV and console with mini bar is located across the bed. The Turkish marble-clad bathroom features glass-enclosed shower, soaking tub, plush bathrobes and towels and Etro bath amenities.
